body:
- added latest version 2020.3
- new variant `nosuffix`: turn off suffixing with _d and _mpi
- new variant `fft`: select between fftw and mkl for fft
- changed description of `double_precision`
- dependencies for matching plumed versions

Pinging maintainers: @junghans @marvinbernhardt
title: gromacs: new version 2020.3; variant nosuffix and mkl support
